thread.section_title: Raffaello Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Clean, well presented hotel.
thread.title_full: Clean, well presented hotel. - Review of Raffaello Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Tom M
title: Clean, well presented hotel.
text: We stayed for 4 nights. All of which have been comfy, quiet and clean. The staff are lovely and helpful. We have been lucky to have a family room for 2 of us, which means plenty of space! The bed is 2 single beds pushed together, which seems to be common place in Europe. It is fine and has posed no problems. The room is cleaned daily. Breakfast is good - continental with scrambled egg if wanted. Thanks
